page.title: 09Tigers Football Club
page.content: Tigers is a football club that was started ten years ago by four lads who placed an advert in the local paper asking for fixtures.This has grown into a club with 7 teams that range from under 11 yrs to under 18 yrs.All the teams play in green and white but have different patterns.They play in the Shrewsbury Leagues and the Oakengates Leagues.They use pitches at Palethorpes factory and M.D.Junior School.They raise funds for themselves and are also sponsored by local firms and organisations.They also raise money for local charities .This year they raised Â£600.They have an annual presentation night when many awards are won.This year the founding four boys made the presentations.
